client
Class Position

java.lang.Object
  client.Position

public class Position
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to hold a user's profit and loss information, including how much they have spent buying stock, how much they gained or lost selling stock, and the value of the stock they currently own.

Author:
Urvi

Method Detail

updatePosition

public void updatePosition(java.lang.String product,
                           Price price,
                           Tradable.Side side,
                           int volume)
                    throws InvalidPriceOperation,
                           InvalidArgumentException
Updates holdings and account costs of a user when trading activity occurs

Parameters:
product - The stock symbol for which to update the position
price - The price of the the Tradable traded
side - The side of trade (BUY or SELL)
volume - The quantity that was traded
Throws:
InvalidPriceOperation - if a MKT Price is added or multiplied
InvalidArgumentException - if side or price is null or if product is null or empty

updateLastSale

public void updateLastSale(java.lang.String product,
                           Price price)
                    throws InvalidArgumentException
Adds the last sale of the specified stock to those the user owns

Parameters:
product - The stock symbol of the product for which to update the last sale
price - The last sale price of the stock
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - if product is null or empty, or if Price is null

Returns the volume of the specified stock the user owns

Returns:
The volume of the stock

                            throws InvalidPriceOperation,
                                   InvalidArgumentException
Returns current value of the stock symbol passed in that user owns

product - The stock symbol for which to determine the position value
Returns:
Price object containing the value of the stock
Throws:
InvalidPriceOperation - if Price is a market price
InvalidArgumentException - if product is null or empty
